statements: UPDATE Banking_Accounts SET balance = balance + 1000 WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
UPDATE Banking_Accounts SET balance = balance - 500 WHERE account_type = 'Checking';
UPDATE Banking_Accounts SET balance = balance * 1.05 WHERE account_type = 'Investment';
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 100 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE accounts SET account_type = 'Savings' WHERE account_id = 2;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 50 WHERE transaction_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1
UPDATE accounts SET balance = 500.00 WHERE account_id = 101
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.00, transaction_type = 'Deposit' WHERE transaction_id = 201
UPDATE Customers SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id=123;
UPDATE Accounts SET balance=1500.50 WHERE account_id=456;
UPDATE Loans SET status='Approved' WHERE loan_id=789;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = 5000.00 WHERE account_number = 1001;
UPDATE loans SET status = 'Approved' WHERE loan_id = 101;
